meanings.definition: A feeling that something bad will happen; premonition.
meanings.sent1: The forebodingness in the air made me uneasy.
meanings.sent2: Her forebodingness about the upcoming storm was palpable.
meanings.sent3: Despite the forebodingness, we decided to go on the camping trip.
meanings.sent4: The forebodingness hung over us like a dark cloud.
meanings.sent5: The forebodingness in his voice sent shivers down my spine.

meanings.definition: The state or quality of being foreboding.
meanings.sent1: The forebodingness of the abandoned house gave me chills.
meanings.sent2: The forebodingness of the situation was hard to ignore.
meanings.sent3: The forebodingness of the dark forest made us giggle nervously.
meanings.sent4: The forebodingness of the old castle was like a silent warning.
meanings.sent5: The forebodingness of the painting made it hard to look away.
